variants.Description in input context: The c.1234A>T variant results in a premature stop codon and reduced SMN protein levels.

Material used.Description: Fibroblasts were isolated from skin biopsies of SMA patients carrying the c.1234A>T variant.

Readout description.Result Description: SMN protein levels were reduced by approximately 80% in fibroblasts carrying the c.1234A>T variant compared to control fibroblasts.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent fibroblast cultures from different SMA patients were used as biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Fibroblasts from a healthy donor were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No explicit negative control was used.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: SMN protein expression between 80% and 120% of control values.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: SMN protein expression below 80% of control values.

Material used.Description: Total RNA was extracted from fibroblasts using TRIzol reagent.

Readout description.Result Description: The expression of the SMN2 transcript was significantly increased in fibroblasts carrying the c.1234A>T variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent fibroblast cultures from different SMA patients were used as biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: RNA from a healthy donor was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No explicit negative control was used.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: SMN2 transcript expression between 1.0 and 1.5 relative to control values.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: SMN2 transcript expression greater than 1.5 relative to control values.
